column1: Baby Barnaby's////The pumpkin pancake is one of the best things I have ever tasted. Throw slow service
column3: and crowded conditions out of the window and consider this little microcosm of perfection. The pumpkin flavor is subtle
column4: but what it adds best is texture
column5: allowing the pancake to be denser
column7: and crispier all at once. Don't ask me the physics of those contradictions
